title: Scaling Yubi's DLP program
text: One of the biggest fintechs of the country, I have been with Yubi for over 3 years, working with multiple teams
Most recently, I worked with the DLP team, stiching together partnerships between fintechs (Ola, GooglePay, Clear), NBFCs (ABFL, KreditBee) and Banks (Axis, CBI).
Received the Extra Miler and Team Player awards at Yubi in 2024, Yayy!

title: Managing Enterprises
text: Before DLP, I was working with our bonds team, where we pioneered a new bonds platform.
I onboarded several multiple wealth partners to drive our business adoption and revenue goals.

title: Mobile app launch & funding talks
text: Worked with founders on GTM strategies, driving 5000+ downloads within 60 days on Google Play Store.
Planned and executed targeted campaigns, increasing engagement by 200%. Conducted user research to develop pricing plans and competitive research to suggest product improvements.
Led fundraising efforts, securing funding proposals from top organizations like GSMA.

title: Leveling Up!
text: Learned to fuse marketing, business & design together.
Worked on real world customer acquistion, retention & monetisation problems with top industry professionals.
Also found a great network out of it

title: Founding team
text: Most of the hats I wore, were created here:)
Part of the founding team, we scaled a small startup from Nagpur to multiple tier-1 cities until covid changed our trajectory for the worse
Mainly owned the marketing and sales engines to create better acquisition for our product and services.

title: City Manager for Non-Profit
text: Volunteered for 4 years with this amazing org, honestly got more back than I gave
Recruited & trained over 300 city volunteers for my City
Led the Transition Readiness Team, guiding underprivileged youth through career transition.

title: Creating delicious experiences
text: A giant in the FMCG sector, Maproâ€™s main offerings are fruit jams, syrups, etc.
I interned here as part of my summer internship program.
Designed and executed online and offline campaigns, expanded SM account reach by 106%, and content engagement by 118%

title: Institute of Rural Management
text: Graduated from IRMA, learned to use words like Synergy, Pivot, Scalability in real life situations.
